physical_examinations.relevant_findings: 64-year-old man with a 10-year history of cocaine use. Physical examination showed a 6 mm fistula in the posterior portion of the hard palate and a large septal perforation without saddle nose deformity. Severe hypernasality with nasal air emission on speech was noted.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Postoperatively, speech improved immediately, with normal function observed at one year follow-up. No evidence of fistula was present, and he reported no cocaine use after rehabilitation therapy.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: In the described case of eccrine spiradenoma, multiple skin-colored, grouped, papulonodular lesions were found on the medial side of the right leg, arranged in a zosteriform pattern. The lesions were firm, tender, and fixed to the skin.
33-year-old morbidly obese man with small burn injuries developed fatal deep vein thrombosis and pulmonary embolism post-discharge.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial postoperative recovery was uneventful; however, symptoms such as severe dyspnea and leg pain developed three days after discharge.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient with multiple abscesses in breasts following injection of materials allegedly containing collagen. Analysis revealed dimethylpolysiloxane, denying it contained collagen.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Repeated surgical drainage required over months due to complications from the injected material.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: A newborn female presented with Tessier 30 median mandibular cleft associated with a hemangioma. Surgical repair involved a triangular flap.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Multiple corrective procedures including Z-plasty were performed over time.
